§ Calckey (Fediverse Software)

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Calckey** is [[fediverse/software]].

**Calckey** started its life as a fork of [[fediverse/software/misskey]].

**Calckey** was created by [[fediverse/person/kainoa-kanter]], who goes by the nickname [[fediverse/software/thatonecalculator]].

**Calckey** was later renamed to “firefish”.
See [[fediverse/software/firefish]] for more information.
